attributes.action: make it compulsory to pay staff on Paternity Leave
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present the law entitles fathers to two weeks' (unpaid) leave when their child is born. Many employers don't make staff forfeit salary, but for the rest of us with bills to pay, we can't afford to lose two weeks' pay; so we can't be at home during this crucial time.
